name: Bird-o-matic
description: Bird-o-matic is a 2D platformer game in which you need to capture birds in a level in a specific order and put them in a machine. If you, however, touch a bird that is not on the next in the order, you will lose all the birds you're carrying. You'll have to choose between getting the birds faster with a higher risk, or be slow and possibly losing the level because of the time counter.
